name: CatBall (Miko122)
description:
CatBall is a fast paced hypercasual game, made for Hitku Kitku GameJam in 4 days.
Manipulate obstacles to make a clear route for a cat and score as many points as you can.
I strongly recommend to download apk file and play this game on mobile devices.
Controls:
Left mouse button on pc, or simply touch the screen on mobile.
